item.title: Business-Driven Agentic Workflow: From Customer Request to Product in 6 Hours - Jarvis and Sam Blog
item.description: Imagine your sales team receives a customer request at 9 AM. By 3 PM the same day, you've not only built a complete AI solution tailored to their needs but also deployed it, created all marketing materials, and launched campaigns. This isn't a future visionâ€”it's what the Business-Driven Agentic Workflow makes possible today.

item.title: Agentic Protocol Future Trends - Jarvis and Sam Blog
item.description: As we stand at the cusp of a new era in artificial intelligence, agentic protocols are emerging as the foundation for how AI systems will communicate, collaborate, and create value in the future. This article explores the key trends shaping this transformation.

item.title: MCP vs A2A: Understanding Modern AI Communication Protocols - Jarvis and Sam Blog
item.description: As AI systems become more sophisticated and interconnected, the protocols governing their communication are evolving from traditional client-server architectures to more distributed, agent-based models.
